definition[0]: to no longer need to use something
example[0]: Have you finished with the scissors?
definition[1]: to have finished talking to someone or dealing with them, especially when you are angry with them or want to punish them
example[1]: Don’t go. I haven’t finished with you yet.
example[2]: ‘When I’m finished with you, ’ he said, ‘you’ll be lucky if you’re still alive.’
definition[2]: to end a romantic or sexual relationship with someone
example[3]: So I told him I wanted to finish with him.
